law.catch_line: License required to provide or hold oneself out as providing home medical equipment and services -- Exemptions.

text.section: No person shall provide home medical equipment and services, or use the title "home medical equipment and services provider" in connection with his or her profession or business, without a license issued by the board.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 4, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2012.
